entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning with 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023
